name: Falling! Again!
description:
Project for PIXEL JAM 2

We are the group of enthusiasts passionate about game design. Here you can find our first project developed for the game jam within 30 hours. The main theme is falling. Enjoy, and try not to fall completely!

As a main character you will find yourself adventuring through picturesque landscapes, but be aware there are a lot of dangers awaiting. Trick the gravity and save yourself on the way up!

Controls

  • A/D - move
  • W - jump
